check.name: NoWhitespaceBefore
check.description: Checks that there is no whitespace before a token. More specifically, it checks that it is not preceded with whitespace, or (if linebreaks are allowed) all characters on the line before are whitespace. To allow linebreaks before a token, set property {@code allowLineBreaks} to {@code true}. No check occurs before semi-colons in empty for loop initializers or conditions.

property.name: allowLineBreaks
property.description: Control whether whitespace is allowed if the token is at a linebreak.
